attributes.action: Ban Fox Hunting / other wildlife too
attributes.background: i want the Govement to Ban Fox Hunting and Wildlife animals because it is a horrble sport and these animals deserve to live.

rejection.details:
Fox hunting is already banned in the UK. We're therefore not sure what further action you want the UK Government and Parliament to take. 

If you want the law that bans fox hunting to be strengthened, you may wish to sign this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/205852
